text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/21829c5f2c86cd525c8468121b4fc54c5d75bf6e|patch 8.2.2415: no way to check for the cmdwin feature>
patch 8.2.2415: no way to check for the cmdwin feature

Problem:    No way to check for the cmdwin feature, cmdline_hist is now always
            enabled.
Solution:   Add has('cmdwin') support. Skip arglist test on Windows
            temporarily.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2415: no way to check for the cmdwin feature · vim/vim@21829c5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2415: no way to check for the cmdwin feature · vim/vim@21829c5
attachments.text: Problem: No way to check for the cmdwin feature, cmdline_hist is now always enabled. Solution: Add has('cmdwin') support. Skip arglist test on Windows temporarily.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b7e2670b6a1de02c772af5097ba24f2a15b26eec|patch 8.2.2414: using freed memory when closing the cmdline window>
patch 8.2.2414: using freed memory when closing the cmdline window

Problem:    Using freed memory when closing the cmdline window.
Solution:   Check the window is still valid.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2414: using freed memory when closing the cmdline window · vim/vim@b7e2670
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2414: using freed memory when closing the cmdline window · vim/vim@b7e2670
attachments.text: Problem: Using freed memory when closing the cmdline window. Solution: Check the window is still valid.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/bb4b93ed85726c3921596ca267f531c8c94d819a|patch 8.2.2413: crash when using :all while using a cmdline window>
patch 8.2.2413: crash when using :all while using a cmdline window

Problem:    Crash when using :all while using a cmdline window. (Zdenek Dohnal)
Solution:   Disallow :all from the cmdline window.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2413: crash when using :all while using a cmdline window · vim/vim@bb4b93e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2413: crash when using :all while using a cmdline window · vim/vim@bb4b93e
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when using :all while using a cmdline window. (Zdenek Dohnal) Solution: Disallow :all from the cmdline window.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ce0370d9e67df80c62ff033aa8ca2dbe86841de9|patch 8.2.2412: not all fields in "cstack" are initialized>
patch 8.2.2412: not all fields in "cstack" are initialized

Problem:    Not all fields in "cstack" are initialized which might cause a
            crash.
Solution:   Use CLEAR_FIELD().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2412: not all fields in "cstack" are initialized · vim/vim@ce0370d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2412: not all fields in "cstack" are initialized · vim/vim@ce0370d
attachments.text: Problem: Not all fields in "cstack" are initialized which might cause a crash. Solution: Use CLEAR_FIELD().
